description:
This talk will include demonstrations of the following topics:
Postgres-XC cluster configuration
Adding/removing servers in the cluster while it is in operation
Configuring slaves for HA solution
Switching the slave when a master fails
What happens to transactions if a master fails
Other Postgres-XC cluster operation
